sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; const App = () => { const [activeStage, setActiveStage] = useState(null); const [materials, setMaterials] = useState({ castorOil: 10, distilledWater: 40, naoh: 5, glycerol: 10, nacl: 5, nahco3: 5 }); const stages = [ { id: 1, name: 'Raw Material Storage', x: 50, y: 100 }, { id: 2, name: 'Mixing Reactor', x: 300, y: 200 }, { id: 3, name: 'Saponification', x: 550, y: 200 }, { id: 4, name: 'Filtration', x: 800, y: 200 }, { id: 5, name: 'Final Storage', x: 1050, y: 100 } ]; return (

Liquid Soap Factory - Chemical Prototyping

Interactive Virtual Model for Saponification Process

{/* Control Panel */}

Process Control

Raw Materials (ml/gm):

Castor Oil: {materials.castorOil}ml
Distilled Water: {materials.distilledWater}ml
NaOH: {materials.naoh}gm
Glycerol: {materials.glycerol}ml
NaCl: {materials.nacl}gm
NaHCO₃: {materials.nahco3}gm
{activeStage && (

Stage {activeStage}: {stages[activeStage - 1].name}

{activeStage === 1 && (

Raw material storage tanks containing all ingredients for saponification process.

Temperature: 25°C | Pressure: 1 atm

)} {activeStage === 2 && (

Mixing reactor where oils and alkali solution are combined.

Temperature: 60-80°C | Mixing Speed: 200 RPM

)} {activeStage === 3 && (

Saponification reactor where chemical reaction occurs: Oil + KOH → Soap + Glycerin

Temperature: 80-100°C | Reaction Time: 2-4 hours

)} {activeStage === 4 && (

Filtration system to remove impurities and excess materials.

Filter Type: Membrane | Pore Size: 0.1μm

)} {activeStage === 5 && (

Final product storage with quality control testing.

pH: 9-10 | Viscosity: 1000-3000 cP

)}
)}

Objective

Prepare liquid soap through saponification where fats/oils react with potassium hydroxide (KOH) to form soap and glycerin. Understanding chemical reactions, ingredient roles, and proper formulation for high-quality, stable, skin-friendly liquid soap.

Chemical Reaction

Fat/Oil + KOH → Soap + Glycerin

C₃H₅(OCOR)₃ + 3KOH → 3RCOOK + C₃H₅(OH)₃

); }; export default App;
